Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Necropolis Avenue, just north of Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Between the farmland on either side of the road, you can see to the south the intersection with Netherworld Lane and the infamous Oceancrest Necropolis. The Necropolis is a large monument to all those citizens who have given their lives towards the betterment of the society. Nearly anyone who is anyone is buried there.
